titles.title: Yehova sainyamulara ayana cittamun neravercu paricarakulara

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehova sainyamulara ayana cittamun neraverchu Paricarakulara ayananu stutincudi mirandaru stutiyincudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehova krpa nidhiyani mahonnatundagu prabhuvani Yugamulanelu maharajani mahima svarupini pogadi padudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kerubu serapulanniyu parisuddha parisuddha prabhuvanucu Paralokamanta pratidhvanimpa parisuddha priyulara pranutinci padudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Madhura gitamuto aradhincu pradhanudainatti sundara duta Madiyandu garvinci troyabadaga adhamulu manala accota nuncenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Tanadaya sankalpamunu batti manayandu tanadu kriyanu jeya Tana kristunandu nirnayinci munduga manala erparacukonenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Raksana svasthyamondunatti aksayula sevimpa ajnapince Laksala dutala samuhamulan viksinci gayucu virula jeyunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ksamiyincu manadu dosamulan kudurcu manadu rogambulan Samadhi nundi vimocinci karuna kirita dharulu jeyunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ghanata, mahima, prabhavamunu niratamu cellunu devuniki Gottepillaku stotramanucu paramandu tana dasulu kirtinci paduduru{/lang-eng}
